summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2518 for the improvement of the East side of Fourth Avenue South, from Connecticut Street to Holgate Street, all in the City of Seattle, by the construction of a sewer therein of proper dimensions and materials, together with all wyes, opening, manholes, catch basins, flush tanks and other appurtenances necessary for the proper sewerage and drainage of said district, under Ordinance No. 28871, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund, and fixing a date for the issuance of bonds.
